動物用藥品名稱: 法德雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎活毒疫苗
業者名稱: 寰海企業股份有限公司
地址: VIA MOLINI EMILI 2 25030 MACLODIO BRESCIA ITALY
效能(適應症): 預防雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎。
ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: ATTENUATED LIVE VIRUS OF AVIAN INFECTIOUSLARYNGOTRACHEITIS, GELENCZEI-MARTY STRAIN NOT LESS THAN 10^3.2TCID50/DOSE. EXCIPIENTS: LACTOSE 50MG/ML; PEPTONE 10MG/ML;PURIFIED WATER Q.S. 1.0ML; SODIUM CHLORIDE 9MG/ML.
